citation_details.title: iCanClean Removes Motion, Muscle, Eye, and Line-Noise Artifacts from Phantom EEG
citation_details.author: RJ Downey, DP Ferris
citation_details.abstract: The goal of this study was to test a novel approach (iCanClean) to remove non-brain sources  from scalp EEG data recorded in mobile conditions. We created an electrically conductive
